people.title: Tesla becomes 6th largest U.S. company, surpassing Berkshire Hathaway
people.summary: > Tesla Inc. TSLA, +2.04% on Friday surpassed Berkshire Hathaway Inc. BRK.A, -0.85% BRK.B, -0.67% as the sixth-largest U.S. company by market capitalization.

corporation.title: With Eye on Tesla, G.M. Hastens Push For Electric Vehicles
Classic British Marques Catch the S.U.V. Bug
corporation.summary: But with S.U.V.s, vans and pickups now accounting for nearly three-quarters of new vehicle sales in the United States, manufacturers in Britain — some familiar, some unexpected — have followed the market.

corporation.title: G.M. Scales Back Alliance With Electric Truck Firm
corporation.summary: Nikola, a start-up electric truck company that had made a big splash on Wall Street, announced a broad alliance with General Motors in September that promised to give the company critical technology, financial support and credibility with investors.
